title: TitleBar.ExtendViewIntoTitleBar in Anniv. Update breaks metrics height and button width metrics
body: I have an app where I use a custom title bar by extending my view into the title bar area:

comments.body: I was able to reproduce problems with the TitleBar sample in the SDK by setting Min and Target to Anniversary Edition. There seems to be a timing problem with the SetTItleBar. It doesn't always set on the first try and you get 0 for SystemOverlayRightInset.
